# Introduction

This webpage documents an R project, `prepare_states`, that:

-   Creates creates target files for states of the form `xx_targets.csv`, where `xx` is a state postal abbreviation.
-   Documents the steps to create these files, and includes related analyses.

An online version of the is [here](https://tmd-areas-prepare-state-targets.netlify.app/).
